examples: It was one of the President's greatest accomplishments.
Fue uno de los mayores logros del presidente.
The series of paintings is quite an accomplishment.
La serie de pinturas es todo un logro.
Drawing and singing were among her many accomplishments.
Dibujar y cantar fueron algunos de sus muchos logros.
He was described as ‘a poet of rare accomplishment’.
Fue descrito como "un poeta de logros excepcionales".
